mapper.select: SELECT total_title, ann_type, reception_type, started_at, closed_at, sub_title, task_type, planning_year, tech_field_name, perf_owner FROM announcement a INNER JOIN sub_announcement sa ON a.ann_no = sa.ann_no WHERE sa.sub_ann_no = #{subAnnNO}

SELECT rp.sub_ann_no, rp.task_name, rp.rnd_task_no, i.name AS institution_name FROM rnd_plan rp LEFT JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = rp.mem_no LEFT JOIN institution i ON i.institution_no = m.institution_no WHERE rp.rnd_plan_no = #{subAnnNo}
SELECT rp.sub_ann_no, rp.task_name, rp.rnd_task_no FROM rnd_plan rp LEFT JOIN researcher r ON r.rnd_plan_no = rp.rnd_plan_no AND r.manpower_role = '연구책임자'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rnd_plan(rnd_plan_no, rnd_task_no, sub_ann_no, mem_no, task_name, plan_status, curr_step, created_at) VALUES (#{rndPlanNo}, #{rndTaskNo}, #{subAnnNo}, #{memNo}, #{taskName}, #{planStatus}, #{currStep}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

INTO rnd_field ( rnd_field_no, rnd_plan_no, name, weight, rank ) VALUES ( seq_rnd_field.NEXTVAL, #{rndField.rndPlanNo}, #{rndField.name}, #{rndField.weight}, #{rndField.rank} )

SELECT m.name AS name, m.rsrch_no AS rsrch_no, i.name as institution_name, m.affil_dept AS affil_dept, m.position AS position, TO_CHAR(m.birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birth FROM member m LEFT JOIN institution i ON i.institution_no = m.institution_no WHERE m.mem_no != 0
